sentences.en: A patch of red cloudburst over the horizon , blood - red, and glowing.
sentences.cn: 天边绽出一小片红霞,血红、发亮.

sentences.en: He relied on translucent enamels to produce vivid, glowing pictures.
sentences.cn: 他利用半透明瓷漆绘制出鲜艳生动的图画。

sentences.en: His cheeks shone red before the glowing oven.
sentences.cn: 他的脸被炉火映得通红.

sentences.en: I’ve had glowing reports from Neil about your work.
sentences.cn: 尼尔在我面前盛赞你的工作。

sentences.en: It is glowing like a spaceship in purlieus of Drayton Park.
sentences.cn: 它像一艘太空船一样在德雷顿公园的边缘闪闪发光；

sentences.en: Misty it is still, glowing through clouds of dust and reek.
sentences.cn: 苍茫依然, 光辉正穿透尘灰的层云.

sentences.en: Patroni stabbed his glowing cigar through the air for emplasis.
sentences.cn: 佩特罗尼把他那只点燃着的雪茄在空中指指点点来强调他的话.

sentences.en: She has a tanned and glowing face.
She was positively glowing with happiness.
The children had glowing cheeks after race.
sentences.cn: 孩子跑完步脸蛋儿红通通的.

sentences.en: The media has been speaking in glowing terms of the relationship between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 媒体一直盛赞两国关系。

sentences.en: The name struck across in his brain with a pleasant glowing tremor.
sentences.cn: 这名字在他脑海里一闪,叫他心旌飘摇,浑身发烧,觉得怪舒服的.

sentences.en: The premieres of his plays brought in glowing reviews.
sentences.cn: 他首演的几部戏都获得了如潮好评。

sentences.en: The tremendous spaciousness of it was glowing with rich gold.
sentences.cn: 苍茫辽阔的景色染上了一片瑰丽浓艳的金黄色.

sentences.en: Their new musical opened to glowing reviews.
sentences.cn: 他们的新音乐剧受到热烈好评.

sentences.en: Their skin was tanned and glowing from their weeks at the sea.
sentences.cn: 他们在海边呆了几个星期，皮肤晒得黝黑发亮。
